Package stars

Class IndexClass

java.lang.Object
stars.IndexClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlatFileObject
public class IndexClass
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlatFileObject
Class representing a lesson under a course and containing its details.
Since:
10/11/2020
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Lai Ming Hui

  • Constructor Details

    • IndexClass

      IndexClass​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String group, java.time.LocalTime start, java.time.LocalTime end, java.time.DayOfWeek day, java.lang.String venue)
      Constructs an instance of index class with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - lesson type of this class, one of "Lecture", "Lab" or "Tutorial"
      group - Group code of this class.
      start - Startiing time of this class
      end - Ending timeof this class
      day - The day this class is held in
      venue - THe venue ona name of this class.

    • IndexClass

      IndexClass()
      Default constructor of this class.

  • Method Details

    • getTypeStr

      public java.lang.String getTypeStr()
      Returns:
      the lesson type of this class (Lecture, Tutorial or Lab)

    • getType

      public IndexClassType getType()

    • setType

      public void setType​(IndexClassType classType)
      Parameters:
      classType - the type of index class to set, among Lecture, Lab and Tuorial.

    • setType

      public boolean setType​(java.lang.String classType)
      Sets the class type of this index class The options should be among Lectures, Lab or Tutorial. If the parameter does not fit the above types, this method will not set anything.
      Parameters:
      classType - One among "Lectures", "Lab" or "Tutorial".
      Returns:
      True if setting the typeis successful, False if the string passed in is not among the supported class types and the method fails to set this object's index class type.

    • getGroup

      public java.lang.String getGroup()
      Returns:
      The group code of this class

    • setGroup

      public void setGroup​(java.lang.String group)
      Parameters:
      group - the group code to set for this class

    • getTime

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.time.LocalTime> getTime()
      Returns an array containing the start and end time of this class. The first item in the list is the starting time, the second time is the ending time.
      Returns:
      A list of LocalTime objects, object at index 0 is the starting time , theobject at index 1 is the ending time.

    • setStartTime

      public void setStartTime​(java.time.LocalTime startTime)
